Indian Economy.title: India’s economy grows 8.2% in July-September quarter, beats estimates
Indian Economy.summary: India's economy grows 8.2% in Q2, surpassing forecasts and driven by strong consumer spending and manufacturing amid global trade challenges.

Indian Economy.title: GDP growth may surpass 7% to cross $4 trillion in FY26: CEA
Indian Economy.summary: Indian economy grew by a higher-than-expected 8.2 per cent in Q2 -- a six-quarter high -- as increased factory production in anticipation of a consumption boost from the GST rate cut helped offset deceleration in farm output
